honda.name: Accord
honda.description: The Honda Accord is a midsize sedan known for its fuel efficiency, safety, reliability, and technology.

honda.name: Civic
honda.description: The Honda Civic is a compact car available in sedan, hatchback, and coupe forms, offering practicality and value.

honda.name: CR-V
honda.description: The Honda CR-V is a compact SUV known for its practicality, efficiency, and refined features, available in gas and hybrid models.
